caption.title: Tumor CNA burden is associated with prostate cancer-specific death in conservative treatment cohort independent of Gleason sum score and CAPRA score.
caption.p: Cox Regression model assessing the association between CNA burden (per 5%) and cancer specific survival. N = 107*

tr.td: Multivariable – adjusting for UCSF-CAPRA score utilizing multiple imputation
Multivariable – adjusting for UCSF-CAPRA score without utilizing multiple imputation * N = 60 (excludes 47 patients with unknown stage)
